DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a High Intensity exercise intervention can elicit cardiovascular disease protection in adolescents.
DOC.brief_title: The Influence of a High Intensity Physical Activity Intervention on a Selection of Health Related Outcomes: An Ecological Approach
DOC.criteria: Healthy 15 18 yer old that are capable of performing vigorous exercise Any health condition that would prevent them from undertaking vigorous exercise
